CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = '23987hxJ#KL95234nl0zBe';
GO


--Create Database scoped credentials
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [sqlondemand]
WITH IDENTITY='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',  
SECRET = '3H/HjA6q9UF8ntJ+Jg6jsKe+Lu2hZRkwn5TilwGihv0byS538w0laC1Y5WwhBK/zoGG1Kw5ngNZmxYBcj/FUnQ=='

--Create External Data Source
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE SqlOnDemandDemo WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://prlangaddemosa.dfs.core.windows.net',
    CREDENTIAL = sqlondemand
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE WeatherSource
WITH ( LOCATION = 'https://isdweathercontainer@prlangaddemosa.dfs.core.windows.net')


--Create External File Format
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT ParquetFormat
WITH (  
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET
);
GO
